body.para: This procedure allows you to assign a Committee position to a participant.
To add a Committee member, click the grid's add button, then select the position from the drop-down list and the participant.

Committee positions are defined in Organisation Details. Importantly. if a committee position name changes from say, Course Coordinator to Course Liaison, the incumbent's role will not be automatically updated. You will have to edit the record and select Course Liaison from the drop-down selection.
You cannot assign a Committee position to a person who is not a participant.
